title: (x) Bombay Sapphire logo ornate serif - custom drawn {Stephen}
content:
Hello All -

Can you help me identify the typeface used for the identity [Bombay Sapphire](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116104513/http:/www.bombaysapphire.com/)

Thanks.
author: sal

comments.content:
No direct match as itâ€™s most likely a custom logo. Have a look at:

[URW Wood Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116104513/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=UR.116465.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=BOMBAY+SAPHIRE&sampleSize=48)  
 [Mesquite](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116104513/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=C.424.0.4&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=BOMBAY+SAPHIRE&sampleSize=48)
Ah, thanks a lot. These are cool.
